trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around May 29th 2008
Summary: black tubeular shape no wings but one side end of it was flush and had a white flush circle glow projecting from it plus it had 2 red reflectors on the side
divs: Sighting Details ok , I was on the 6-10 going south bound over the port of houston , as soon as the freeway merges right I started to noticed an unusual object , I initially thought it was a helicopter from the distant , saw the long black shape with the two red dot reflectors on the side but with a white circular light on one end , what struct me odd was that no light beam or nothing was shooting of it , since i figured it was a chopper just still and it was pretty low , I will say about 40ft above the light post on the side of the freeway,, now the closer I got to it since it was hovering next to the 45 freeway , the shape began to look clearer , I started to get confused I saw no blades spining so it looked like a blimp wierd , now .....once I got on the overpass to merge to 45 ,I saw it the complete shape , in a way it had a lump on top on the side where the white glow was coming from sort of like a huge missle hovering , but as soon as i slowed down the two red reflectors light up really bright then quickly made a sharp left turn the instintly stopped ,!!! I imediatly got off the first exit busted a uturn, it was gone , I even went doen the freeway to see if it moved further down ...nothing this all was around 12:25am Now I kept thinking it was a blimp but I think of the way it moved then with a quick burst of speed then to sop , na it was something I had never seen
